problem_names:
lemma finite_supp_map_bset_Not [simp]:
  assumes "finite (supp xset)"
  shows "finite (supp (map_bset Not xset))"

lemma Disj_eqvt [simp]:
  assumes "finite (supp xset)"
  shows "p \<bullet> Disj xset = Disj (p \<bullet> xset)"

lemma Disj_eq_iff [simp]:
  assumes "finite (supp xset1)" and "finite (supp xset2)"
  shows "Disj xset1 = Disj xset2 \<longleftrightarrow> xset1 = xset2"

lemma valid_Disj [simp]:
    assumes "finite (supp xset)"
    shows "P \<Turnstile> Disj xset \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>x\<in>set_bset xset. P \<Turnstile> x)"

lemma Disj_eqvt [simp]:
  assumes "finite (supp xset)"
  shows "p \<bullet> Disj xset = Disj (p \<bullet> xset)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> Disj xset = Disj (p \<bullet> xset)

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite (supp xset)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> Disj xset = Disj (p \<bullet> xset)

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite (supp xset)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. p \<bullet> Formula.Not (Conj (map_bset Formula.Not xset)) =
    Formula.Not (Conj (map_bset Formula.Not (p \<bullet> xset)))

lemma Disj_eq_iff [simp]:
  assumes "finite (supp xset1)" and "finite (supp xset2)"
  shows "Disj xset1 = Disj xset2 \<longleftrightarrow> xset1 = xset2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Disj xset1 = Disj xset2) = (xset1 = xset2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite (supp xset1)
  finite (supp xset2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Disj xset1 = Disj xset2) = (xset1 = xset2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite (supp xset1)
  finite (supp xset2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Formula.Not (Conj (map_bset Formula.Not xset1)) =
     Formula.Not (Conj (map_bset Formula.Not xset2))) =
    (xset1 = xset2)

lemma valid_Disj [simp]:
    assumes "finite (supp xset)"
    shows "P \<Turnstile> Disj xset \<longleftrightarrow> (\<exists>x\<in>set_bset xset. P \<Turnstile> x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Turnstile> Disj xset =
    (\<exists>x\<in>set_bset xset. P \<Turnstile> x)

proof (prove)
using this:
  finite (supp xset)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Turnstile> Disj xset =
    (\<exists>x\<in>set_bset xset. P \<Turnstile> x)
